# Getting Started This wiki is a work-in-progress reference for the Vista UI layer. ## Quick Start ` import 'vista! view .html [ text "Hello" button "OK" [print "ok"] ] ` ## Build the Docs ` arturo tools/build.art ` ## See Also - [VID Overview](/wiki/vid-overview/) - Learn about the VID dialect
